text: Pacific Heights is a melodramatic 1990 suspense drama movie. It is about apartment tenants who are at first welcomed, but later evicted and forced to leave the apartment. Michael Keaton, Melanie Griffith and Laurie Metcalf are in the cast. This movie was released in September 1990, and the reviews were mixed. However, the movie performed very well at the box office, earning back almost $45 million. Category:1990 thriller movies Category:1990 drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by John Schlesinger Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: Pacific Heights (movie)
